function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Personal information disclosed in telemedicine sessions","Impact":"Privacy violation, unauthorized sharing of sensitive information","Mitigation":"Use encrypted communication, secure data storage, and access controls","Technologies":"Encryption, access control, Privacy by-Design","People":"Patients, doctors, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Automated contact tracing applications aggregating sensitive location data without user consent","Impact":"Privacy violation, unauthorized sharing of location data","Mitigation":"Obtain user consent, anonymize location data, limit data retention","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data retention policies","People":"App users, public","Owner":"App developers, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and transparency about data sharing and privacy risks in e-health technology","Impact":"Uninformed consent, potential privacy breaches","Mitigation":"Provide clear consent mechanisms, transparency about data handling practices","Technologies":"User-friendly consent interfaces, privacy education","People":"E-health technology users","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"}]}
